alert.note: Alert for Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 5:37PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A high based weakening thunderstorm will impact portions of western Prowers, northwestern Baca and southeastern Bent Counties through 615 PM MDT... At 535 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking this weakening thunderstorm 16 miles northwest of Two Buttes Reservoir, or 27 miles northwest of Springfield, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. Local brief gusts to around 60 mph will be possible immediately under or near the thunderstorm. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Two Buttes Reservoir. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
